Material used.Description: Tissue samples were obtained from cancer patients and underwent Sanger sequencing.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_004724.5:c.1981C>T was detected in the tissue samples of some cancer patients.

Biological replicates.Description: Since Sanger sequencing is not a method for biological replicates, it was not performed in this experiment.

Technical replicates.Description: Since Sanger sequencing is a single-read technique, no technical replicate was performed.

Basic positive control.Description: Sanger sequencing does not require a basic positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Sanger sequencing does not require a basic negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Source: Not applicable as Sanger sequencing is a qualitative technique.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: Not applicable as Sanger sequencing is a qualitative technique.
